SEARCH
Package application

Class Database

java.lang.Object
application.Database
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Database extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the central database for the Hospital Management System. Manages data storage, retrieval, and initialization for various entities, including doctors, patients, pharmacists, and administrators. Handles both serialized file storage and CSV-based initialization.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen

  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      public Database()
      Default constructor for the Database class.

  • Method Details

    • initialiseDatabase

      public static void initialiseDatabase()
      Initializes the database by loading data from a serialized file or CSV files. If a serialized file exists, it loads the data; otherwise, it initializes data from CSV files.

    • saveSerializedDatabase

      public static void saveSerializedDatabase()
      Saves the current state of the database to a serialized file.

    • loadSerializedDatabase

      private static boolean loadSerializedDatabase()
      Loads the database from a serialized file, if it exists.
      Returns:
      True if the data was successfully loaded, false otherwise.

    • getTotalStaffCount

      public static int getTotalStaffCount()
      Retrieves the total count of staff members, including doctors, pharmacists, and administrators.
      Returns:
      The total number of staff members.

    • loadStaffData

      private static void loadStaffData(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads staff data from a CSV file and initializes corresponding entities.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the staff data CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • loadPatientData

      private static void loadPatientData(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads patient data from a CSV file and initializes corresponding entities.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the patient data CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • findUserById

      public static User findUserById(String userId)
      Finds and returns a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(String id)
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID. Delegates the search to findUserById(String).
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, or null otherwise.

    • displayAllUsers

      public static void displayAllUsers()
      Displays all users stored in the database. Includes doctors, pharmacists, administrators, and patients.
